name: Cubix
description:
Welcome to the exciting world of our new game, "Cubix". Feel the adrenaline and challenges in this exciting platformer where every step can be decisive!

In Cubix, you will find an incredible adventure with challenging jumps. Embark on a fascinating world where you will have to use your reflexes and intelligence to overcome all obstacles.

Your character has only one life, so your every move must be deliberate and careful. Navigate through dangerous platforms, jump over chasms, and avoid tricky traps that stand in your way.

Get ready for a challenge as each level is filled with unpredictable puzzles and hard jumps. You will test your skills and abilities to the limit.
